name: Crab World Battles
description:
Play on Scratch  Here

Crab World Battles!!!

Welcome to the amazing world of Crabby Fights!

___________________________________________

How to play:

Move your Crab with the Arrow Keys

Your Crab points towards the Mouse pointer

Hold Mouse to Attack with your pincers!

Your Health Bar is right below your crab

Your Opponent is AI Controlled. 

He Can also attack and move

___________________________________________

Shop:

There are 3 Different Crab Types, which are available in the Shop. You can buy them for coins. You get coins by defeating your opponents

Normal Crab: The Basic Crab. It is The Default Crab. Completely Free!

HP : 10 ATK : 1 COST : Free

Boxer Crab: A tough opponent. His Arms can stretch up to a very big Range! 

HP : 15 ATK ; 1-2 COST : 20

King Crab: The Strongest and the Biggest of all Crabs! Although Strong, his arms don't stretch long!

HP : 20 ATK : 2 COST : 60

___________________________________________

Mechanics:

Click the Play button to start a match

There are 3 Rounds in a Match

Each round takes place in a different Place

The Opposing Crab can be any one of the three types of crab. 

The more rounds you win, The higher the chances of a stronger crab spawn.

Stronger crabs give more coins

When in Water (Blue), Every Crab moves slower as compared to Land (Sandy)

___________________________________________
